located on a high hill surrounded by scrub forests, was
not affected.
Residents and officials said that Vill botania
was saved as a community project
to  minimize the damage caused by forest fires
before the fire broke out. The community
cut back vegetation, trimmed foliage and
cleared trash around the houses on
the top of the hill. They also brought in water to keep the
soil moist while building.  surrounding walls and trenches
to prevent fire from approaching.
